type.name: Main
type.summary:
Stochastic Oscillator is a momentum indicator that looks back N periods to produce a scale of 0 to 100. %J is also included for the KDJ Index extension.
See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Number of periods for the Oscillator.
Smoothing period for the %D signal line.
Smoothing period for the %K Oscillator. Use 3 for Slow or 1 for Fast.
type.returns: Time series of Stochastic Oscillator values.

type.name: Extended

type.name: Results
type.summary:
Stochastic indicator results includes aliases for those who prefer the simpler K,D,J outputs.
See documentation for more information.
type.remarks:
Standard output properties:
Oscillator %K Oscillator over prior lookback periods.
Signal %D Simple moving average of %K Oscillator.
PercentJ
%J is the weighted divergence of %K and %D: %J=3×%K-2×%D
These are the aliases of the above properties:
K Same as Oscillator.
D Same as Signal.
J Same as PercentJ.
